DOC.brief_title: Reviewing DAA Efficacy Managing Patient Treatment In Online Neighbourhoods
DOC.detailed_description: The high price Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) Direct Acting Antiviral ( DAA ) medication many country lead patient seek less expensive generic alternative . The efficacy safety generic medication formally demonstrate clinical practice . The primary goal REDEMPTION collate clinical result generic medication . The secondary goal answer efficacy question currently insufficient trial data available - example Sofosbuvir+Daclatasvir appear inexpensive pan genotypic solution treat HCV globally support total n less 1000 , common genotype , HCV Genotype 2 , n 52 make wide margin error high degree uncertainty .
